column4: how can I grab/create/make a cd image from a cd-rom in ubuntu?

Ok thanks. I just noticed I'm having these troubles with my cd rom drive anyway... it works when in XP, but I don't want to use that anymore. in ubuntu some cd's don't get recocnized and other then that I can't burn cds because they always lock up in the middle of the burn process. in xp everything is fine
the head of the cd rom drive just jumps back an forth but it can't recocnize the cd
